shortDescription:
White Glove Delivery Included

  • Excellent for the gamer, movie enthusiest, or interior decorator in your home
  • Built-in power strip for electronics
  • Hardwood solids and cherry veneers
longDescription: The Ellerton media console is well-suited for today’s casual lifestyle. Its elegant style and expert construction will make it a centerpiece in any home. Soundly constructed, the Ellerton uses hardwood solids & cherry veneers elegantly finished in a rich dark cherry finish.  With ample storage for electronics & media, it also cleverly allows for customization with three choices of interchangeable door panels.
